name: Coffee Adventure
description:
Español:

Coffee Adventure es una aventura de texto que hice un día que me aburría en clase con mi amigo Carlos para testear un sistema de texto que estaba programando en Unity. Funciona bien.

Controles: Enter para avanzar en el texto y A/B para elegir opciones.

English:

Coffe Adventure is a text adventure that I made with my friend Carlos  one day we were bored in college. It was made for testing a text system I was programming in Unity. It works pretty well. Sorry, but the game is in Spanish.

Controls: Enter to advance in the text and A/B  to choose options.
